section.title: We would like your opinion
section.para: If you find any errors in this manual, we welcome your suggestions. In the case of a typographical or conceptual error, you can submit it by email including the following information:
Manual's identifier: Installation_IPS-rbLive-v.3 [EN](201509), chapter or section and page number, including the fragment of text that contains the said error.
This information allows us to easily locate the error and and rectify it in order to improve the documentation that accompanies our products.
We also appreciate any suggestion related to the organization or display of the information that helps us to optimize our manuals.
Always consult the latest version of the documentation available at: http://support.redborder.net
Comments can be sent to the following email address: info@redborder.net
